A coffee mug that doubles as a portable phone charger, allowing you to stay connected and charged on-the-go.
A coffee mug that changes color depending on the temperature of your coffee, making it easy to know when your drink is ready.
A coffee mug with a built-in LED light, allowing you to enjoy your morning cup of coffee while also getting a little extra light to start your day.
A coffee mug with a built-in aromatherapy diffuser, allowing you to enjoy the relaxing scent of your favorite essential oils while sipping on your coffee.
A coffee mug that tracks your daily coffee intake, helping you monitor your caffeine intake and stay within your recommended limit.
